meaning: Just a glance (due to being busy/short on time)
description: 「Cong cong」 means hurried, hasty, or in a rush. It describes a situation where one can only take a quick look because one is busy and has no time.

examples.chinese: 忙碌的上班时间里,看到了一片彩霞,只是匆匆一瞥
examples.translation: During the busy commute to work, I saw a rosy dawn, but it was just a quick glance

examples.chinese: 美术馆来太晚了,无奈时间有限,只有匆匆一瞥
examples.translation: I arrived at the art gallery too late, unfortunately time was limited, so I only had a quick glance

examples.chinese: 虽然很多绝美之地只是匆匆一瞥,但已经深深印在我脑海里
examples.translation: Although I only had a quick glance at many beautiful places, they are already deeply imprinted in my mind
